execution_plan.description: Retrieve all invoices with their status and invoice date from the orders database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT invoice_number, invoice_status_code, invoice_date FROM Invoices;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve shipment dates for invoices returned in step 1 from the shipments database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT invoice_number, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE invoice_number IN ($step1.invoice_number);
